  ::  allocated 4-byte codec 
 ERR  Cannot store all Huffman codewords in 32-bit representation
 ERR  Huffman codeword representation requires at least 33 bits (longest codeword: 25 bits)
  !!  switch to fallback codec 
  !!  online allocate fallback (8-byte) codec 
[2m[0m
(c) COMPRESSION REPORT
  compression ratio    16.09

  [1m[31mkernel           time, ms      GiB/s[0m
  predict          0.536576     173.57
  histogram        0.262144     355.27
  huff-enc         1.334272      69.80
  outlier          0.242080     384.72
  (subtotal)       2.375072      39.21
  book             2.230272      41.76
  (total)          4.605344      20.22
